content: The Old Gourd is the starting Gourd on offer in Black Myth: Wukong. It is by far the simplest Gourd in the game, focusing entirely on refilling your health. Unlike some of the other Gourds, the Old Gourd doesn't have any special effects or alterations.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Old_Gourd.md', within the main section titled 'Old Gourd'.
The content is as follows:
The Old Gourd is the starting Gourd on offer in Black Myth: Wukong. It is by far the simplest Gourd in the game, focusing entirely on refilling your health. Unlike some of the other Gourds, the Old Gourd doesn't have any special effects or alterations.
